16.79 Total Megapixels, 11 Elements in 9 Groups (2 ED Lens Elements), Digital Zoom Magnification (560 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction (Motion Detection (Still Pictures)), Autofocus Focus-area Selection (Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Face Priority, Manual with 99 Fo...View More
16.79 Total Megapixels, 11 Elements in 9 Groups (2 ED Lens Elements), Digital Zoom Magnification (560 mm Lens in 35 mm (135) Format), Motion Blur Reduction (Motion Detection (Still Pictures)), Autofocus Focus-area Selection (Auto (9-area Automatic Selection), Center, Face Priority, Manual with 99 Focus Areas, Subject Tracking), Min Focus Range: 50 cm (W) - 1 m (T), Focus Lock, 5 Level Brightness Adjustment, Shooting Mode Monitor Frame Coverage (97% Horizontal, 97% Vertical), Playback Mode Monitor Frame Coverage (100% Horizontal, 100% Vertical), Recording Reslution (HD: 1280 x 720p at 30 fps, HS: 1920 x 1080 at 15 fps, 1280 x 720 at 60 fps, HS: 640 x 480 at 120 fps, 320 x 240 at 24 fps, iFrame: 960 x 540 at 30 fps), Voice Memo Function, Exposure Control (Programmed Auto Exposure, Exposure Compensation), Exposure Modes (Programmed Auto), Scene Modes (Back Light, Beach, Black and White Copy, Close-up, Dusk / Down, Easy Panorama, Fireworks Show, Food, Landscape, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Part / Indoor, Pet Portrait, Scene Auto Selector, Snow, Sunset, 3D Photography, Underwater), In-camera Image Editing (Crop, Data Imprint, D-lighting, Glamour Retouch, Quick Effects, Quick Retouch, Small Picture), Exposure Compensation: 2 EV in incremetns of 1/3, Mechanical and CMOS Electronic Shutter, 4 secs Shutter Speed (Fireworks Show), Aperture (Electronically Controlled ND Filter (-2.0 AV) Insertion), TTL Auto Flash with Monitor Preflashes, Interface Data Transfer Protocol (MTP, PTP), HDMI Output (Auto, 480p, 720p, 1080i), Charging Time (2 hrs 30 mins When Using MH-65 Battery Charger), 250 Shots Battery Life, Tripod Socket (1/4, ISO 1222), Land Operating Temperature: -10 to ° C, Underwater Operating Temperature: 0 to 40° C, Operating Humidity: 85%, Waterproof (Depth of 18 m and for 60 mins), Shockpoof, Wireless LAN (IEEE 802.11b/g/n, ARIB STD-T66 (Standard for Low Power Data Communications Systems), Communications Protocols (IEEE 802.11b: DBPSK, DQPSK, CCK IEEE 802.11g: OFDM IEEE 802.11n: OFDM), Range (Line of Sight): 30 m (32 yd) (Varies with Location), Operating Frequency (2412 - 2462 MHz (1 - 11 Channels)), Data Rates Actual Measured Values (IEEE 802.11b: 5 Mbps IEEE 802.11g: 12 Mbps IEEE 802.11n: 12 Mbps), Security (Open / WPA2), Access Protocols (CSMA / CA), Electronic Compass (16 Cardinal Points (Position Correction Using 3-axis Acceleration Sensor, Automatic Correction for the Deviated Angle and Automatic Offset Adjustment), Dustproof, Continuous Shooting (Best Shot Selector, Continous H, Continous H 60, Continous H 120, Continous L, Multi-shot 16, Pre-shooting Cache, Single), Built-in GPS (Receiver Frequency 1575.42 MHz (C/A Code), Geodetic System WGS 84)
JPEG, MPO, DCF, EXIF 2.3, DPOF, MPF
